languages.text: {n}Лицо Абеляра немного разглаживается.{/n} "Вы... правы. По крайней мере в той части, которая касается жалоб младших офицеров вам лично".
{n}Abelard's face relaxes slightly.{/n} "You're... right. At least as concerns junior officers making complaints directly to you."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Абеляра немного разглаживается.{/n} "Вы... правы. По крайней мере в той части, которая касается жалоб младших офицеров вам лично".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard's face relaxes slightly.{/n} "You're... right. At least as concerns junior officers making complaints directly to you."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的表情微微放松了些。{/n}“您……说得对，至少在下级军官直接向您投诉这件事情上确实如此。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face relaxes slightly.{/n} "You're... right. At least as concerns junior officers making complaints directly to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的表情微微放松了些。{/n}“您……说得对，至少在下级军官直接向您投诉这件事情上确实如此。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Abelard se relaja ligeramente.{/n} «Tiene... razón. Al menos, en lo que se refiere a oficiales novatos quejándose a usted directamente».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face relaxes slightly.{/n} "You're... right. At least as concerns junior officers making complaints directly to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Abelard se relaja ligeramente.{/n} «Tiene... razón. Al menos, en lo que se refiere a oficiales novatos quejándose a usted directamente».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドの表情がわずかに緩む。{/n}「あなたの…言うとおりです。少なくとも、下級士官が直接あなたに苦情を言うことに関しては」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face relaxes slightly.{/n} "You're... right. At least as concerns junior officers making complaints directly to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドの表情がわずかに緩む。{/n}「あなたの…言うとおりです。少なくとも、下級士官が直接あなたに苦情を言うことに関しては」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelards Miene entspannt sich etwas.{/n} "Ihr ... habt recht. Zumindest, was die Frage angeht, ob niedere Offiziere Beschwerden direkt bei Euch vorbringen sollten."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face relaxes slightly.{/n} "You're... right. At least as concerns junior officers making complaints directly to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelards Miene entspannt sich etwas.{/n} "Ihr ... habt recht. Zumindest, was die Frage angeht, ob niedere Offiziere Beschwerden direkt bei Euch vorbringen sollten."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les traits d'Abélard se détendent légèrement.{/n} « Vous... vous avez raison. Les officiers subalternes ne devraient pas vous importuner avec leurs récriminations. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face relaxes slightly.{/n} "You're... right. At least as concerns junior officers making complaints directly to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les traits d'Abélard se détendent légèrement.{/n} « Vous... vous avez raison. Les officiers subalternes ne devraient pas vous importuner avec leurs récriminations. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın yüzü biraz olsun gevşiyor.{/n} "Haklısınız... En azından kıdemsiz subayların size doğrudan ilettiği şikâyetler konusunda öyle oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face relaxes slightly.{/n} "You're... right. At least as concerns junior officers making complaints directly to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard'ın yüzü biraz olsun gevşiyor.{/n} "Haklısınız... En azından kıdemsiz subayların size doğrudan ilettiği şikayetler konusunda."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
